instruction: Please help me write a poem for my valentine. I have been married to her for 20 years and I love her very much!
output:
My dearest love,

Twenty years have passed,
Since the day we first met,
And in that time,
Our love has only grown deeper.

You are my rock, my shelter,
My best friend, my confidante,
The one who knows me best,
And still loves me just the same.

You are the sunshine in my day,
The star that guides me through the night,
The warmth that keeps me safe,
And the light that shines so bright.

You are my forever,
My soulmate, my partner,
The one who makes my heart sing,
And fills my life with laughter.

So on this special day,
I want to say thank you,
For being my Valentine,
And for loving me so true.

Happy Valentine's Day,
My dearest, sweetest love,
I cherish you more than words can say,
And I will love you until the end of time.

The end.
